title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point for a correct description of a condition:

• Correct descriptions of a condition include: large population size, no selection, no mutation, no migration, and random mating
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point for a correct description of a condition:

• Correct descriptions of a condition include: large population size, no selection, no mutation, no migration, and random mating

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point for a correct description of a condition:

• Correct descriptions of a condition include: large population size, no selection, no mutation, no migration, and random mating
